ground_truth: He heads towards her, and they are somehow situated as if they were alone in this crowd. Susan is in pain now; she can't summon an answer. They regard each other, and after a long pause, they have reached an understanding. He takes her in his arms, and they dance away. On a distant fringe of the party, on a grass terrace that still commands a view of the dance floor, is Joe. His eyes are on Parrish and Susan; he watches them admiringly yet ruefully. A Waiter passes, catches sight of Joe, and stops. Joe regards the Waiter for a moment. The Waiter hesitates, then moves off. Joe's attention returns to Parrish and Susan; the dance number ends with a BOOM. On the dance floor, Parrish looks up and sees Joe up on the terrace, waiting. Suddenly, he hugs her, holding her very close. She looks at him; he smiles, nods, but doesn't release her until she smiles back. Now she heads out with the crowd for the fireworks. When Parrish senses she is on her way, he turns and heads up towards Joe. Joe rises to meet Parrish as he approaches. They watch the guests gathering to view the fireworks. Joe waits and regards Parrish, waiting until he has a sense that Parrish has accepted what Joe has said, then Joe continues. Parrish waits, smiles faintly, takes a deep breath, and strides out again, Joe right with him. In tandem, they continue on and disappear over the crest of the hill. A barrage of fireworks lights up the sky. Down below, Susan, in a pained reflex, again turns and looks up towards the hill. She hesitates, then glides away from the party, her step quickening as she walks up towards the hill. Susan halts, and in the distance, a figure is approaching from over the crest of the hill where Joe and Parrish disappeared. He is heading straight for her; she tries to make him out, seems to recognize him, and starts to walk towards him as if pulled by a magnet. Now she stops again. It is a man who keeps coming, and now that he is close, she recognizes him. Something about him makes Susan slightly tentative. Joe shrugs, scratches his head endearingly, uncertain of time and place. Some realization is dawning on Susan, rendering her lightheaded. Susan regards Joe intently, searching his face for an answer. Susan holds herself very still. She searches the Young Man's eyes; his face is open, completely vulnerable, waiting for her response. After a long silence, the words come out haltingly. Susan sighs, the Young Man smiles gently, and they are completely intent on each other. Susan smiles as the fireworks finale goes off, the MUSIC comes up from below, and the night fills with light.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: He directs towards her, and they are somehow positioned as if they were solitary in this throng. Susan is in agony now; she can't call forth a reply. They observe each other, and after a lengthy pause, they have achieved an understanding. He takes her in his embrace, and they sway away. On a remote edge of the gathering, on a grassy terrace that still commands a vista of the dance floor, is Joe. His eyes are on Parrish and Susan; he observes them admiringly yet wistfully. A Server passes, catches sight of Joe, and halts. Joe observes the Server for a moment. The Server hesitates, then moves off. Joe's focus returns to Parrish and Susan; the dance number concludes with a BOOM. On the dance floor, Parrish glances up and perceives Joe up on the terrace, waiting. Suddenly, he embraces her, holding her very close. She looks at him; he grins, nods, but doesn't release her until she grins back. Now she heads out with the throng for the pyrotechnics. When Parrish senses she is on her path, he turns and heads up towards Joe. Joe rises to meet Parrish as he approaches. They watch the visitors assembling to view the fireworks. Joe waits and observes Parrish, waiting until he has a notion that Parrish has accepted what Joe has stated, then Joe proceeds. Parrish waits, grins faintly, takes a deep breath, and strides out again, Joe right with him. In tandem, they continue on and vanish over the peak of the hill. A barrage of pyrotechnics illuminates the sky. Down below, Susan, in a pained reflex, again turns and looks up towards the hill. She hesitates, then glides away from the gathering, her step accelerating as she walks up towards the hill. Susan stops, and in the distance, a figure is advancing from over the peak of the hill where Joe and Parrish vanished. He is heading straight for her; she tries to make him out, seems to recognize him, and starts to walk towards him as if drawn by a magnet. Now she stops again. It is a man who keeps coming, and now that he is near, she recognizes him. Something about him makes Susan slightly cautious. Joe shrugs, scratches his head endearingly, uncertain of moment and place. Some realization is dawning on Susan, rendering her dizzy. Susan observes Joe intently, searching his visage for a reply. Susan holds herself very still. She searches the Young Man's eyes; his visage is open, completely vulnerable, waiting for her response. After a long silence, the words come out hesitantly. Susan exhales, the Young Man smiles gently, and they are completely focused on each other. Susan smiles as the fireworks finale goes off, the MELODY arises from below, and the night fills with radiance.

Each other is regarded by them, and after a long pause, an understanding is reached by them. She is taken in his arms by him, and they dance away. On the dance floor, Parrish looks up and sees Joe up on the terrace, waiting. Suddenly, she is hugged by him, and she is held very close. The sky is lit up by a barrage of fireworks. Down below, in a pained reflex, Susan turns again and looks up towards the hill. She hesitates, then glides away from the party, her step quickening as the hill is walked towards by her. Susan halts, and in the distance, a figure approaches from over the crest of the hill where Joe and Parrish disappeared. He is headed straight for her; a recognition attempt is made by her, he seems to be recognized, and she starts walking towards him as if pulled by a magnet. Now she is stopped again. It is a man who keeps coming, and now that his closeness allows, recognition is achieved by her. Something about him induces slight tentativeness in Susan. Joe shrugs, scratches his head endearingly, uncertain of time and place. Some realization is dawning on Susan, and she becomes lightheaded. Joe is regarded intently by Susan, his face is searched for an answer by her. Susan remains very still. The Young Man's eyes are searched by her; his face is open, completely vulnerable, awaiting her response. After a long silence, the words come out haltingly. Susan sighs, the Young Man smiles gently, and complete intentness on each other is shared by them. Susan smiles as the fireworks finale goes off, the MUSIC comes up from below, and the night fills with light.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: He approaches her, and they seem alone in the crowd. Susan is in pain and can't respond. They share a look, reaching an understanding. He embraces her, and they dance away. On the party's edge, Joe watches them admiringly but wistfully. A Waiter pauses by Joe, hesitates, then moves on. Joe's attention returns to Parrish and Susan; the dance ends with a BOOM. Parrish sees Joe on the terrace, hugs Susan closely until she smiles back, then she joins the crowd for fireworks. Parrish turns toward Joe. They meet, observing guests gathering for the display. Joe watches Parrish accept his words, then they stride out together over the hill. Fireworks light the sky as Susan looks up, hesitates, then walks up the hill. She stops, recognizing a figure approaching. Once close, she identifies him, feeling tentative. Joe appears uncertain, scratching his head. Susan realizes something, feeling lightheaded. She examines Joe's face, and after a silence, words come haltingly. Susan sighs, and the Young Man smiles gently, captivated by each other. Susan smiles as the fireworks finale illuminates the sky, and music fills the night.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: He approaches her, and they feel alone in the crowd. Susan is in pain, unable to reply. They look at each other, reach an understanding, and dance away. On the party's fringe, Joe watches them with admiration and regret. A Waiter notices Joe, pauses, then leaves. Joe focuses back on Parrish and Susan; the dance ends with a BOOM. Parrish sees Joe on the terrace, waits, hugs her closely until she smiles back. She exits for the fireworks. When sensing she’s gone, Parrish joins Joe. They watch guests gather, and Joe waits until Parrish accepts his words. Smiling faintly, Parrish strides out with Joe, disappearing over the hill. Fireworks illuminate the sky. Below, Susan, in reflex, looks up at the hill, quickening her pace towards it. She stops as a figure approaches from where Joe and Parrish went. Recognizing him, she walks towards him, then hesitates. The man continues, and she recognizes him fully, feeling tentative. Joe shrugs, scratching his head, uncertain. A realization leaves Susan lightheaded, and she studies Joe's face for answers. She stands still, searching the Young Man’s vulnerable eyes, and slowly speaks. Susan sighs, and the Young Man smiles gently. They focus on each other as fireworks and MUSIC fill the night.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: He begins to make his way towards her, finding a path through the crowd, and it seems as though, despite the throng of people around them, they have managed to create a bubble of isolation, as if they were the only two present in the entire scene. Susan is overwhelmed by pain at this moment; she finds herself unable to muster a response, words eluding her in her time of need. They gaze at one another, and after what feels like an eternity, filled with silent contemplation, they reach a mutual understanding, unspoken but deeply felt. He gently wraps her in his arms, and together, they sway away, dancing in harmony. In a more secluded corner of the party, situated on a grass-covered terrace that still allows for an unobstructed view of the dance floor below, stands Joe. His eyes are fixed on Parrish and Susan as they dance; there's an unmistakable sense of admiration in his gaze, touched with a hint of ruefulness. A Waiter happens to pass by, notices Joe, and pauses momentarily. Joe locks eyes with the Waiter for a brief moment. The Waiter hesitates, unsure, then decides to move on. Joe's focus shifts back to Parrish and Susan; the dance number comes to a dramatic conclusion with a resonant BOOM. On the dance floor, Parrish lifts his gaze and spots Joe, who is watching from the terrace, patiently waiting. In a spontaneous gesture, he pulls Susan into a close embrace, holding her tightly. She meets his eyes; he responds with a smile, a nod, but does not loosen his hold until she reciprocates with a smile of her own. Together with the crowd, she begins to make her way towards the spectacle of fireworks. As Parrish senses her departure, he turns on his heel and starts to make his way up towards Joe. Joe rises from his spot to meet Parrish as he draws near. They stand together, observing the guests gathering in anticipation of the fireworks display. Joe waits, studying Parrish, until he perceives that Parrish has accepted the message he conveyed, then continues the conversation. Parrish stands still, a faint smile playing on his lips, takes in a deep breath, and strides forward once more, with Joe accompanying him. Side by side, they advance and disappear over the hill's crest. A grand display of fireworks explodes into life above, lighting up the night sky in vivid colors. Below, Susan, reacting almost reflexively, turns to glance up at the hill once again. After hesitating, she gracefully moves away from the party, her pace accelerating as she climbs towards the hill. Susan pauses and, in the distance, sees a figure emerging from beyond the crest of the hill, where Joe and Parrish had disappeared from view. The figure comes directly towards her; she strains to discern who it might be, seems to recognize him, and begins to walk in his direction, drawn as if by an invisible force. Suddenly, she halts once more. Approaching her, she now clearly recognizes the man. A subtle quality about him makes her feel slightly tentative. Joe, in a charmingly uncertain manner, gives a slight shrug, scratches his head, unsure of the timing or the place. Some realization dawns on Susan, causing her to feel lightheaded with discovery. Susan inspects Joe closely, searching his face for some kind of answer. She holds herself utterly still. Her eyes probe the Young Man's own; his expression is open, fully vulnerable, awaiting her reaction. After a prolonged silence, words finally emerge, hesitantly forming. Susan releases a sigh; the Young Man offers a gentle smile, their focus on one another becoming absolute. As Susan smiles, the fireworks reach their grand finale, the MUSIC swells from below, and the darkness of the night sky is filled with dazzling light.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: He begins to make his way in her direction, carefully navigating a path through the densely packed crowd, and it seems as if, despite the bustling throng of people surrounding them, they have somehow managed to create an isolated bubble around themselves, as though they were the only two individuals present in the entire scene. At this significant moment, Susan is completely overwhelmed by a wave of pain; she finds herself utterly unable to muster a response, with words completely eluding her when she most needs them. They gaze deeply into each other’s eyes, and after what feels like an eternity, filled with profound silent contemplation, they reach an unspoken yet deeply felt mutual understanding. He gently wraps her in his arms with a tender embrace, and together, they sway gracefully, dancing in perfect harmony. In a more secluded, tranquil corner of the party, situated on a grass-covered terrace that allows for an unobstructed view of the lively dance floor below, stands Joe. His eyes remain fixed on Parrish and Susan as they move in sync; there is an unmistakable sense of admiration in his gaze, touched with a hint of ruefulness. As a waiter happens to pass by, he notices Joe and pauses momentarily. Joe locks eyes with the waiter for a brief moment. The waiter hesitates, appears unsure, then ultimately decides to move on. Joe’s focus shifts back to Parrish and Susan just as the dance number comes to a dramatic conclusion with a resonant BOOM. On the dance floor, Parrish lifts his gaze and spots Joe, who is watching from the terrace, waiting patiently. In a spontaneous, heartfelt gesture, he pulls Susan into a close, warm embrace, holding her tightly in a loving manner. She meets his eyes; he responds with a gentle smile and a nod, but he does not loosen his hold until she reciprocates with a smile of her own. Together with the crowd, she begins to make her way toward the spectacle of fireworks, eager to watch the display. As Parrish senses her departure, he pivots on his heel and starts to make his way up towards Joe’s location. Joe rises from his spot, ready to meet Parrish as he draws near. They stand together, observing the guests gathering with anticipation for the upcoming fireworks display. Joe waits, carefully studying Parrish, until he perceives that Parrish has accepted the message he conveyed, then continues the conversation. Parrish stands still, a faint smile playing on his lips, takes a deep, thoughtful breath, and strides forward once more, with Joe accompanying him in step. Side by side, they advance and finally disappear over the crest of the hill. Above them, a grand display of fireworks explodes into life, lighting up the night sky in bright, vivid colors. Below, Susan, reacting almost reflexively, turns to glance up at the hill once again. After hesitating briefly, she gracefully begins to move away from the party, her pace gradually accelerating as she climbs toward the hill. Susan pauses and, in the distance, sees a figure emerging from beyond the crest of the hill, where Joe and Parrish had vanished from view. The figure comes directly toward her; she strains her eyes to discern who it might be, seems to recognize him, and slowly begins to walk in his direction, drawn as if by an invisible force. Suddenly, she halts once more. As the man approaches her, she now clearly recognizes him. A subtle quality about him makes her feel slightly tentative. Joe, in a charmingly uncertain manner, gives a slight shrug and scratches his head, unsure of the timing or the place. Some realization dawns on Susan, causing her to feel lightheaded with the surprise of the discovery. Susan inspects Joe closely, searching his face intently for some kind of answer. She holds herself utterly still, her eyes probing the young man’s own; his expression is open, fully vulnerable, as he awaits her reaction. After a prolonged silence, words finally begin to emerge, hesitantly forming. Susan releases a soft sigh, and the young man offers a gentle smile in response, their focus on one another becoming absolute and unwavering. As Susan smiles, the fireworks reach their grand finale, with the music swelling powerfully from below, and the dark night sky is filled with dazzling, brilliant light.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: He begins to navigate through the throng towards her, somehow creating a cocoon of isolation around them as if they were the only two present amidst the bustling crowd. Susan, noticeably in discomfort, finds herself unable to muster a response to whatever is weighing on her mind. They lock eyes, and as seconds stretch into a prolonged, charged pause, a silent but profound understanding settles between them. Gently, he enfolds her in his embrace, and together, they begin to sway, moving gracefully across the space as if in a private dance away from everyone else. Meanwhile, perched on a grass terrace at the outer edge of the party, yet still maintaining a vantage point over the dance floor, stands Joe, whose gaze is fixed on Parrish and Susan, watching them with a mixture of admiration and a hint of wistfulness. A waiter ambles by, momentarily catching sight of Joe and coming to an abrupt stop. Joe meets the waiter’s eyes briefly before the waiter hesitates and then continues on his way. Joe’s attention shifts back to Parrish and Susan just as the music climaxes with a resounding BOOM. On the dance floor, Parrish’s eyes lift and connect with Joe’s, who remains up on the terrace, seemingly in anticipation. In a sudden movement, Parrish hugs Susan tightly, drawing her close until their proximity is almost palpable. Susan looks up at him; he responds with a reassuring smile and a nod, maintaining the embrace until a smile finally plays on her lips. Once she smiles back, she allows herself to be swept along by the throng heading to witness the fireworks. As Parrish perceives that she is making her way out, he turns purposefully, ascending towards Joe. Joe rises as Parrish approaches, and together, they watch the partygoers congregate, eager for the fireworks show. Joe holds back, observing Parrish patiently until he discerns that Parrish has comprehended and accepted his previous counsel. Only then does Joe proceed with the conversation. Parrish, gathering himself, allows a faint smile, inhales deeply, and strides purposefully forward once more, Joe accompanying him steadfastly. In unison, they move forward and soon disappear beyond the hill’s crest. Meanwhile, a series of vibrant fireworks explodes across the night sky. Below, Susan, responding to an involuntary pang, glances back towards the hill’s peak. She hesitates briefly before decisively breaking away from the party, her pace accelerating as she begins to ascend the hill. Halting midway, she notices a silhouette emerging against the backdrop where Joe and Parrish had vanished. The figure approaches directly towards her; she squints, trying to discern his identity, and a moment of recognition seems to stir her, prompting her to step forward, almost as if drawn by an irresistible force. Suddenly, she halts again. A man continues his approach, and as he nears, his features become clearer to Susan, and recognition solidifies. An inexplicable aura around him causes her to feel slightly apprehensive. Joe, from a distance, gives a slight shrug, endearingly scratches his head, as though bewildered by the unfolding events in both time and space. A burgeoning realization dawns on Susan, leaving her slightly unsteady. She fixes her gaze intently on Joe, seeking answers, holding herself completely still as she tries to read his expression. In the presence of the Young Man, with his eyes wide open, vulnerable, and imploring her response, she remains silent for what seems like an eternity. The tension finally breaks as words spill out of her, hesitantly yet deliberately. Susan exhales deeply, prompting a tender smile from the Young Man; they remain wholly absorbed in each other’s presence. As Susan allows herself to smile, the grand finale of the fireworks bursts overhead, music wafts up from the gathering below, and the evening sky is illuminated with a dazzling display of lights.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: He approaches Susan, and despite the crowd, they seem isolated in their own world. Susan, unable to respond due to her pain, shares a long, understanding gaze with him. He embraces her, and they dance away together. Meanwhile, Joe observes them from a distant terrace with a mix of admiration and regret. After a Waiter momentarily distracts him, Joe's focus returns to Parrish and Susan as the dance ends. Parrish embraces Susan tightly, prompting her to smile before she heads towards the crowd gathering for fireworks. Parrish then makes his way to Joe, who stands to greet him. They watch the festivities as Joe gauges Parrish's readiness; once assured, they walk side by side and vanish over the hill. Fireworks illuminate the sky, drawing Susan's gaze upward. She briskly moves towards the hill, stopping when she sees a figure approaching. As he nears, she recognizes him and starts moving towards him, then hesitates. The man continues forward, and upon recognizing Joe, Susan feels a mix of familiarity and uncertainty. Joe's endearing shrug and Susan's realization leave her lightheaded. She studies him intently, holding still as the Young Man, open and vulnerable, awaits her response. After a reflective silence, Susan responds hesitantly, sharing a mutual focus with him. As the fireworks finale and music fill the night, Susan smiles, captivated by the moment.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: He heads towards her, weaving through the throng as if they were alone in the festive gathering teeming with glittering lights and lively music. Susan, encumbered by a sharp pain from an old injury sustained during her years as a dancer, can't summon an answer. They regard each other in the muted glow of the party lights, and after a long, contemplative pause, they have reached an unspoken understanding. He takes her in his arms with the grace of someone who has studied ballroom dancing, and they dance away, moving seamlessly across the floor. On a distant fringe of the party, on a grass terrace designed during the estate's landscaping transformation in the 1920s, is Joe. His eyes are on Parrish and Susan; he watches them admiringly yet ruefully, reflecting on the paths that have brought them all here. A Waiter, dressed in the classic black and white uniform of the elite catering company renowned in the region, passes, catches sight of Joe, and stops. Joe regards the Waiter for a moment, pondering whether to request another drink or not. The Waiter hesitates, then moves off with the practiced ease of someone used to serving at opulent gatherings. Joe's attention returns to Parrish and Susan; the dance number ends with a BOOM from the percussion section of the live jazz band. On the dance floor, Parrish looks up and sees Joe up on the terrace, waiting. Suddenly, feeling an urge to express the bond they share, he hugs her, holding her very close. She looks at him; he smiles, nods, but doesn't release her until she smiles back, a genuine reflection of their shared history. Now she heads out with the crowd for the fireworks that are set to be a spectacular display over the lake. When Parrish senses she is on her way, he turns and heads up towards Joe. Joe rises to meet Parrish as he approaches, the moonlight casting a gentle glow over their reunion. They watch the guests gathering to view the fireworks, their brightly colored bursts beginning to paint the sky. Joe waits and regards Parrish with the patience of an old friend, waiting until he has a sense that Parrish has accepted what Joe has said, then Joe continues, confident in their understanding. Parrish waits, smiles faintly, takes a deep breath that fills him with resolve, and strides out again, Joe right with him, like two comrades setting out on a path anew. In tandem, they continue on and disappear over the crest of the hill, where whispers of their conversation fade into the night. A barrage of fireworks lights up the sky with a brilliance that reflects in the eyes of onlookers. Down below, Susan, in a pained reflex, again turns and looks up towards the hill, the place where memories and futures intertwine. She hesitates, then glides away from the party, her step quickening as she walks up towards the hill where so much has already played out. Susan halts, and in the distance, a figure is approaching from over the crest of the hill where Joe and Parrish disappeared into the shadows. He is heading straight for her; she tries to make him out, squinting against the backdrop of exploding colors, seems to recognize him, and starts to walk towards him as if pulled by a magnet powered by hope and curiosity. Now she stops again, her heart fluttering with uncertainty. It is a man who keeps coming, and now that he is close, she recognizes him as an old friend from her college days, someone she hadn't expected to see. Something about him, perhaps the way the years have changed him, makes Susan slightly tentative. Joe, who has always had a knack for diffusing tension with humor, shrugs, scratches his head endearingly, uncertain of time and place in this moment of unexpected reunion. Some realization is dawning on Susan, rendering her lightheaded, as the memories from their shared past flood back. Susan regards Joe intently, searching his face for an answer, a glimmer of the connection they once shared. Susan holds herself very still, as if bracing for whatever revelation might come next. She searches the Young Man's eyes; his face is open, completely vulnerable, waiting for her response, the moment heavy with potential. After a long silence, the words come out haltingly, as though each one must be carefully chosen. Susan sighs, a release of the tension held within, the Young Man smiles gently, and they are completely intent on each other, the world around them fading into the background. Susan smiles as the fireworks finale goes off, the MUSIC, a swelling symphony piece performed live by the orchestra, comes up from below, and the night fills with light and sound, a perfect backdrop to this moment of reconnection.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. Parrish waits smiles faintly takes a deep breath and strides out again. Joe right with him. In tandem they continue on and disappear over the crest of the hill. A barrage of fireworks lights up the sky. Down below Susan in a pained reflex again turns and looks up towards the hill. She hesitates then glides away from the party her step quickening as she walks up towards the hill. Susan halts and in the distance a figure is approaching from over the crest of the hill where Joe and Parrish disappeared. He is heading straight for her. she tries to make him out seems to recognize him and starts to walk towards him as if pulled by a magnet. Now she stops again. It is a man who keeps coming and now that he is close she recognizes him. Something about him makes Susan slightly tentative. Joe shrugs scratches his head endearingly uncertain of time and place. Some realization is dawning on Susan rendering her lightheaded. Susan regards Joe intently searching his face for an answer. Susan holds herself very still. She searches the Young Man's eyes his face is open completely vulnerable waiting for her response. After a long silence the words come out haltingly. Susan sighs. the Young Man smiles gently and they are completely intent on each other. Susan smiles as the fireworks finale goes off. the MUSIC comes up from below and the night fills with light.

test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: The dog heads towards the rabbit, and they are somehow situated as if they were alone in this crowd. The tree is in pain now; it can't summon an answer. The cloud and the moon regard each other, and after a long pause, they have reached an understanding. The dog takes the rabbit in its arms, and they dance away. On a distant fringe of the party, on a grass terrace that still commands a view of the dance floor, is the cyclist. His eyes are on the musician and the tree; he watches them admiringly yet ruefully. A bird passes, catches sight of the cyclist, and stops. The cyclist regards the bird for a moment. The bird hesitates, then moves off. The cyclist's attention returns to the musician and the tree; the dance number ends with a BOOM. On the dance floor, the musician looks up and sees the cyclist up on the terrace, waiting. Suddenly, the musician hugs the rabbit, holding it very close. The rabbit looks at the musician; the musician smiles, nods, but doesn't release the rabbit until it smiles back. Now the rabbit heads out with the crowd for the fireworks. When the musician senses the rabbit is on its way, the musician turns and heads up towards the cyclist. The cyclist rises to meet the musician as the musician approaches. They watch the guests gathering to view the fireworks. The cyclist waits and regards the musician, waiting until the musician has a sense that the musician has accepted what the cyclist has said, then the cyclist continues. The musician waits, smiles faintly, takes a deep breath, and strides out again, the cyclist right with them. In tandem, they continue on and disappear over the crest of the hill. A barrage of fireworks lights up the sky. Down below, the tree, in a pained reflex, again turns and looks up towards the hill. The tree hesitates, then glides away from the party, its step quickening as it walks up towards the hill. The tree halts, and in the distance, a figure is approaching from over the crest of the hill where the cyclist and the musician disappeared. It is heading straight for the tree; the tree tries to make it out, seems to recognize it, and starts to walk towards it as if pulled by a magnet. Now the tree stops again. It is a penguin who keeps coming, and now that it is close, the tree recognizes it. Something about the penguin makes the tree slightly tentative. The cyclist shrugs, scratches its head endearingly, uncertain of time and place. Some realization is dawning on the tree, rendering it lightheaded. The tree regards the cyclist intently, searching its face for an answer. The tree holds itself very still. It searches the dancer's eyes; its face is open, completely vulnerable, waiting for the tree's response. After a long silence, the words come out haltingly. The tree sighs, the dancer smiles gently, and they are completely intent on each other. The tree smiles as the fireworks finale goes off, the MUSIC comes up from below, and the night fills with light.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He drifts towards her, and they are somehow situated as if they were alone in this crowd. Susan is feeling unwell now; she can't muster an answer. They observe each other, and after a long pause, they have reached a compromise. He holds her in his arms, and they sway away. On a distant fringe of the party, on a grass terrace that still commands a view of the dance floor, is Joe. His eyes are on Parrish and Susan; he observes them admiringly yet ruefully. A Waiter strolls by, catches sight of Joe, and pauses. Joe examines the Waiter for a moment. The Waiter deliberates, then ambles off. Joe's attention returns to Parrish and Susan; the dance number concludes with a BOOM. On the dance floor, Parrish glances up and notices Joe up on the terrace, observing. Suddenly, he embraces her, holding her very close. She gazes at him; he grins, nods, but doesn't release her until she grins back. Now she merges with the crowd for the fireworks. When Parrish discerns she is on her way, he pivots and advances towards Joe. Joe stands to meet Parrish as he nears. They observe the guests assembling to view the fireworks. Joe pauses and assesses Parrish, waiting until he has a sense that Parrish has embraced what Joe has said, then Joe proceeds. Parrish lingers, grins faintly, inhales deeply, and paces out again, Joe right alongside him. In unison, they press on and vanish over the crest of the hill. A barrage of fireworks illuminates the sky. Down below, Susan, in a pained reflex, again rotates and gazes up towards the hill. She lingers, then flows away from the party, her step hastening as she marches up towards the hill. Susan ceases, and in the distance, a figure is emerging from over the crest of the hill where Joe and Parrish vanished. He is advancing straight for her; she tries to discern him, seems to recognize him, and begins to walk towards him as if drawn by a magnet. Now she halts again. It is a man who keeps coming, and now that he is close, she identifies him. Something about him makes Susan slightly hesitant. Joe shrugs, scratches his head endearingly, uncertain of time and place. Some realization is dawning on Susan, rendering her lightheaded. Susan examines Joe intently, searching his face for an answer. Susan holds herself very still. She explores the Young Man's eyes; his face is open, completely vulnerable, waiting for her response. After a long silence, the words emerge falteringly. Susan exhales, the Young Man beams gently, and they are completely engrossed in each other. Susan grins as the fireworks finale erupts, the MUSIC ascends from below, and the night fills with light.

The guitar regards the umbrella intently, searching its face for an answer. The guitar holds itself very still. test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: She drifts towards him, and they appear as if they are isolated in this congregation. Michael is in bliss now; he can't craft a question. They observe each other, and after a brief exchange, they have crafted an agreement. She releases him from her embrace, and they skip away. On a secluded edge of the gathering, on a stone patio that commands a view of the performance area, is Lily. Her gaze is on Thomas and Michael; she observes them admiringly yet thoughtfully. A Guest strolls by, catches sight of Lily, and pauses. Lily studies the Guest for a moment. The Guest considers, then strolls off. Lily's attention returns to Thomas and Michael; the show concludes with a BOOM. On the dance stage, Thomas glances down and spots Lily on the patio, anticipating. Abruptly, he greets him, holding him very close. He glances at him; she nods, gestures, but doesn't release him until he nods back. Now he glides out with the congregation for the display. When Thomas perceives he is departing, he turns and drifts down towards Lily. Lily lowers to encounter Thomas as he nears. They observe the visitors assembling to witness the display. Lily lingers and observes Thomas, lingering until she senses that Thomas has comprehended what Lily has conveyed, then Lily proceeds. Thomas lingers, grins slightly, exhales deeply, and marches out again, Lily beside him. In unison, they advance and vanish over the peak of the ridge. A cascade of lights ignites the sky. Down below, Michael, in a joyful impulse, again turns and glances down towards the ridge. He pauses, then dashes away from the gathering, his pace hastening as he sprints down towards the ridge. Michael pauses, and in the distance, a figure is emerging from over the peak of the ridge where Lily and Thomas vanished. She is veering straight for him; he attempts to make her out, seems to identify her, and starts to dash towards her as if drawn by gravity. Now he pauses again. It is a woman who continues approaching, and now that she is close, he identifies her. Something about her makes Michael slightly hesitant. Lily stretches, rubs her arm charmingly, uncertain of space and moment. Some realization is dawning on Michael, rendering him weightless. Michael studies Lily intensely, scrutinizing her expression for a solution. Michael holds herself very still. He scrutinizes the Young Woman's eyes; her expression is open, completely sensitive, waiting for his reply. After a brief silence, the phrases emerge smoothly. Michael chuckles, the Young Woman grins softly, and they are completely focused on each other. Michael grins as the display finale erupts, the MUSIC rises from above, and the evening fills with warmth.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He ambles towards her, and they are somehow positioned as if they were isolated in this parade. Susan is in discomfort now; she can't craft a response. They gaze at each other, and after a brief interlude, they have forged an agreement. He enfolds her in his arms, and they sway away. On a remote edge of the gathering, on a pebble terrace that still offers a perspective of the performance area, is Joe. His eyes are on Parrish and Susan; he observes them approvingly yet wistfully. A Vendor ambles by, catches sight of Joe, and pauses. Joe studies the Vendor for a moment. The Vendor lingers, then ambles off. Joe's focus returns to Parrish and Susan; the performance concludes with a CLAP. On the performance area, Parrish glances up and notices Joe up on the terrace, lingering. Suddenly, he clutches her, holding her very near. She glances at him; he grins, affirms, but doesn't release her until she grins back. Now she drifts out with the parade for the display. When Parrish discerns she is on her way, he pivots and strolls up towards Joe. Joe stands to greet Parrish as he nears. They observe the guests assembling to view the display. Joe lingers and scrutinizes Parrish, waiting until he perceives that Parrish has absorbed what Joe has expressed, then Joe proceeds. Parrish lingers, grins slightly, draws a deep breath, and marches out again, Joe right alongside him. In unison, they proceed on and vanish over the rise of the ridge. A cascade of display illuminates the horizon. Down beneath, Susan, in an uneasy reflex, again swivels and glances up towards the ridge. She pauses, then drifts away from the gathering, her pace hastening as she strides up towards the ridge. Susan halts, and in the distance, a silhouette is emerging from over the rise of the ridge where Joe and Parrish vanished. He is trekking directly for her; she attempts to discern him, seems to identify him, and commences to stroll towards him as if drawn by an invisible force. Now she pauses again. It is a figure who keeps proceeding, and now that he is near, she identifies him. Something about him makes Susan slightly hesitant. Joe shrugs, pats his shoulder charmingly, unsure of time and spot. Some awareness is dawning on Susan, leaving her slightly dizzy. Susan examines Joe intently, seeking an answer in his expression. Susan holds herself very poised. She inspects the Young Man's gaze; his expression is candid, completely defenseless, awaiting her reaction. After a long lull, the words emerge hesitantly. Susan exhales, the Young Man grins softly, and they are utterly focused on each other. Susan grins as the display's climax erupts, the MELODY ascends from beneath, and the night brims with radiance.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The tiger drifts towards the castle, and they are magically positioned as if they were alone in this ocean. Harriet is in joy now; she can't procure a question. They observe each other, and after a brief silence, they have reached a disagreement. The tiger takes the castle in its paws, and they sprint away. On a nearby edge of the circus, on a sandy plateau that still commands a view of the sprinting path, is Sarah. Her hands are on Marcus and Harriet; she listens to them eagerly yet wistfully. A Clown prances by, catches sight of Sarah, and pauses. Sarah observes the Clown for a moment. The Clown contemplates, then twirls away. Sarah's interest returns to Marcus and Harriet; the sprinting event concludes with a ROAR. On the sprinting path, Marcus gazes down and spots Sarah crouched on the plateau, listening. Instantly, he lifts it, clutching it very tightly. It gazes at him; he grins, waves, but doesn't release it until it chuckles back. Now it drifts out with the ocean for the parades. When Marcus guesses it is on its way, it twists and drifts down towards Sarah. Sarah stands to meet Marcus as he retreats. They listen to the beasts gathering to spectate the parades. Sarah rests and observes Marcus, resting until she has an inkling that Marcus has embraced what Sarah has sung, then Sarah twirls. Marcus rests, grins gently, inhales deeply, and skips inwards again, Sarah skipping alongside. Simultaneously, they twirl inwards and vanish beneath the peak of the canyon. A cascade of parades ignites the ocean. Up above, Harriet, in a joyful whim, again turns and listens down towards the canyon. She twirls, then glides away from the circus, her pace slowing as she drifts down towards the canyon. Harriet stands, and in the fog, a bird is leaping from beneath the peak of the canyon where Sarah and Marcus vanished. She is drifting backwards to it; she attempts to hear it out, seems to recognize it, and starts to glide away from it as if pushed by a gust. Now she twirls again. It is a bird which keeps leaping, and now that it is distant, she recognizes it. Something about it makes Harriet slightly hesitant. Sarah frowns, rubs her beak awkwardly, puzzled by sound and shadow. Some memory is emerging in Harriet, making her lightfooted. Harriet observes Sarah carefully, seeking her ears for a question. Harriet stands herself very tense. She seeks the Old Bird's tail; her ears are open, completely guarded, listening for her greeting. After a quick noise, the sounds come out smoothly. Harriet yawns, the Old Bird laughs quietly, and they are completely focused on each other. Harriet chuckles as the parade finale ends, the DRUMS rise from above, and the morning fills with sound.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: He approaches Susan, and amidst the crowd, they find a secluded connection. Susan is in pain and silent, but they reach an understanding. He embraces her, and they dance. Joe watches them from a distance, admiringly but ruefully. A waiter briefly catches Joe's attention, but he refocuses on the couple as the dance ends with a boom. Parrish embraces Susan tightly before she joins the crowd heading to watch fireworks. Parrish then approaches Joe, and they watch guests gather for the show. Joe waits, senses Parrish's acceptance, and they proceed together over the hill. Fireworks illuminate the sky as Susan looks toward the hill. She heads there, quickening her pace. Susan sees a figure approaching and recognizes him, feeling drawn to him. As he nears, she becomes tentative but recognizes Joe, who appears uncertain. Susan searches his face for answers. After a long pause, she responds haltingly. The Young Man smiles; they focus intently on each other as the fireworks finale lights the night.
